description: {"blocks":[{"key":"131fv","text":"This protocol details methods for the immunofluorescence staining of neurons.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

journals.name: Neuron
journals.citation: Yang S, Park D, Manning L, Hill SE, Cao M, Xuan Z, Gonzalez I, Dong Y, Clark B, Shao L, Okeke I, Almoril-Porras A, Bai J, Camilli PD, Colón-Ramos DA, Presynaptic autophagy is coupled to the synaptic vesicle cycle via ATG-9. Neuron 110(5). doi: 10.1016/j.neuron.2021.12.031

","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":99,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":112,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"abt5q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eop1k","text":"Blocking and permeabilization buffer (called blocking buffer)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":61}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"52f91","text":"3% BSA (to quench non-specific protein binding sites)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"23ojh","text":"0.2% Triton X-100 (to  permeabilize cells) in PBS","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","5_0":"","5_1":""},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["64","66"],"data":[["136 mM","NaCl"],["2.5 mM","KCl"],["2 mM","CaCl2"],["1.3 mM","MgCl2"],["10 mM","HEPES"],["10 mM","glucose"]],"guid":"FFE1E3354E5611ECA43B0A58A9FEAC02","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["136 mM","NaCl"],["2.5 mM","KCl"],["2 mM","CaCl2"],["1.3 mM","MgCl2"],["10 mM","HEPES"],["10 mM","glucose"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23]}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"","data":{"concentration":"0.1","error_concentration":false,"guid":"18E804704E5811ECBD0F1F162C487EC9","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":21}},"2":{"type":"ph","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"E10F4B804E5711ECBD0F1F162C487EC9","id":0,"number":"7.3"}}}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5kvdg","text":"Wash cultured hippocampal neurons with pre-warmed tyrode.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aanph","text":"Fix the cells with fixative solution for   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":41,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":46,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7np7d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"5B1C22C04E5511ECBD0F1F162C487EC9","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"5DDA31504E5511ECBD0F1F162C487EC9","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"f6omn","text":"After fixation, wash the cells with PBS. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5e0ud","text":"Wash the cells briefly with PBS and incubate the cells with primary antibodies (1:500 ~ 1:2000) in a blocking buffer for   at   on a rocking platform.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":121,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":126,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2g5gg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"BDC825404E5511ECBD0F1F162C487EC9","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"C12AFF504E5511ECBD0F1F162C487EC9","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2k5i5","text":"Wash with PBS on a rocking platform.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cpoip","text":"Incubate the cells with secondary antibodies (for example Alexa-fluor-labeled) (1:1000) in a blocking buffer for   on a rocking platform at  in the dark.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":113,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":139,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"au08j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":2700,"guid":"2CABE6E04E5611ECBD0F1F162C487EC9","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"2F3921704E5611ECBD0F1F162C487EC9","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"39s08","text":"Decant the secondary antibodies and wash with PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6uq6d","text":"Observe the fluorescence signal using an inverted confocal microscope or mount the samples with Prolong Gold antifade reagent for long-term storage","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
